title: JSON schema for Kirby 4 CMS blueprint files

@default.description: Default value for the field, which will be used when a page/file/user is created

@empty.description: Sets the text for the empty state box

@help.description: Optional help text below the field

@image.description: Image options to control the source and look of file previews

@label.description: label is the new official replacement for headline

@limit.description: Sets the number of items per page

@multiple.description: If false, only a single one can be selected

@page.description: Sets the default page for the pagination

@parent.description: Sets the query to a parent to find items for the list

@pattern.description: A regular expression, which will be used to validate the input

@size.description: The size option controls the size of cards

@sortBy.description: Overwrites manual sorting and sorts by the given field and sorting direction

@template.description: Filters all files by template and also sets the template, which will be used for all uploads

@text.description: Setup for the main text in the list or cards
